price: (69) We [i.e., Allāh] said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham."
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
